# Circuit generated by QLib
# Generated by Amit Saha
# CV PLUS GATE for 4 qudits
.qudit 4

qubit x0
qutrit x1
qutrit x2
qutrit x3

.begin
CNOT x2 x0
RX x0 180
CNOT x0 x3
CX x0 x1
CX x1 x3
CX x0 x1
CNOT x3 x0
CX x2 x3
CX x3 x1
CX x2 x3
CX x0 x3
CX x3 x2
CX x0 x3
CX x1 x2
CX x2 x0
CX x1 x2
CX x0 x1
CX x1 x3
CX x0 x1
RX x0 180
CNOT x3 x1
CNOT x3 x2
.end
